name: fal
description: fal is redefining the generative-media infrastructure layer for the AI era. As the leading platform for real-time video, image, audio and 3D generation, fal is building the world’s first Generative Media Cloud—designed to give developers and enterprises access to more than 600 production-ready models through a unified API. fal’s systems already support hundreds of millions of end users globally, a clear demonstration of the platform’s ability to operate at extraordinary scale.
